content:
Hi everyone!
example create multi Patient resource in single msg use HAPI FHIR Budle

Hi @Dongtu,

For implementation questions, generally ask under #implementers and for HAPI-specific questions, ask under #hapi. And in either case, you're going to have to expand on your question a bit. Are you wanting to create multiple patients in a single transaction? If so, have you looked at the transaction example in the spec?
I'm sorry. It's first time I come here
Totally fine. I'm just giving guidance to help you going forward. I'm glad you're here - it's a great way to get questions answered
